meta.quality: photorealistic, high-resolution, detailed mirror selfie photograph
meta.style: A candid mirror selfie captured in a richly decorated, neon-lit gaming room.

subject.identity: A young woman with long, wavy platinum blonde hair falling over her shoulders.
subject.pose: Standing in front of a large mirror, holding up a smartphone with her right hand to take a selfie, looking at her reflection. A colorful beaded charm hangs from the phone.
subject.outfit: An oversized black graphic t-shirt featuring a large print of the anime character Sailor Moon with text, paired with simple black biker shorts.

environment.location: A bedroom setup as a gaming room, viewed entirely through the mirror reflection.
environment.lighting: Dominated by vibrant pink and purple ambient lighting radiating from LED strips and PC components, casting a colored glow across the entire scene.
environment.background_details: The wall behind her is heavily decorated with numerous anime posters. To the left, a white shelf is packed with various plush toys (Squishmallows, Sanrio). Below it sits a white gaming PC tower with active blue and pink RGB lighting. To the right is a desk with dual monitors, a gaming keyboard, mouse, and a headset resting on a stand.

realism_focus.details: Focus on the authentic quality of the mirror reflection, the specific glow from the RGB lights and screens, the cotton texture of the oversized t-shirt, and the cluttered, personalized details of the room.
